post.summary: Send inbound orders to Trading system for execution.
post.description: This endpoint takes the list of inbound orders and place them on Trading system for execution.

Single Order (Minimum Fields).summary: Very basic single order with only required fields.

200.description: Expected response, returns the list of orders.

403.description: User is forbidden with current credentials.

415.description: Missing/Invalid Content-Type header. Header needs to be set to application/json.

429.description: Rate limit reached. Wait before sending further requests.

500.description: Server error. Log the X-DataDirect-Request-Key header to assist in troubleshooting.

503.description: Request timed out. Retry the request in sometime.

post.summary: Replace the inbound orders on Trading system.
post.description: This endpoint takes the list of orders to be replaced on the Trading system.

200.description: Expected response, returns the list of order ids.

403.description: User is forbidden with current credentials.

415.description: Missing/Invalid Content-Type header. Header needs to be set to application/json.

429.description: Rate limit reached. Wait before sending further requests.

500.description: Server error. Log the X-DataDirect-Request-Key header to assist in troubleshooting.

503.description: Request timed out. Retry the request in sometime.

post.summary: Cancel the inbound orders on Trading system.
post.description: This endpoint takes the list of inbound orders to be cancelled on the Trading system.

500.description: Server error. Log the X-DataDirect-Request-Key header to assist in troubleshooting.

put.description: This endpoint allows the user to update parent orders which are already present in Trading system.

ticketId.description: Ticket Id for the child order to be cancelled

reason.description: Reason for cancelling the child order
reason.example: mistyped order quantity to be routed

originalClientOrderId.description: Unique identifier of the original order, generated in Create.

inboundDestination.description: To facilitate integration with translators that transform orders into a format compatible with the internal order routing and execution infrastructure.

inboundOrders.description: List of inbound orders to cancel

side.description: Side of the order.If the parent order side is 'buy', valid values are 'buy' or 'buyMinus'. If the parent order side is 'sell', valid values are 'sell' or 'sellPlus'

orderQuantity.description: Number of shares/Quantity to be routed. Must be less than or equal to the orderQuantity of the parent order.

handlingInstructions.description: Instructions for order handling on Broker trading floor.

exDestination.description: Execution destination as defined by institution when order is entered.

destination.description: Represents the designated venue or location to which an order is intended to be routed.

stopPrice.description: Stop-loss price to buy/sell stock at market.

maxFloor.description: Maximum number of shares within an order to be shown on the exchange floor at any given time.

minQuantity.description: Minimum quantity of an order to be executed.

settlementDate.description: Specific date of trade settlement in YYYYMMDD format.

executionInstructions.description: Instructions for order handling on exchange trading floor.

locateRequired.description: Indicates whether the broker is to locate the stock in conjunction with a short sell order.

profile.description: A name given to broker algo

ticketId.description: Ticket Id for the child order

isCovered.description: Signifies if a specific order is a covered order. A covered order is one that involves an investment strategy with the capability to limit the potential loss of the order.

maxShow.description: Maximum number of shares within an order to be shown to other customers.

maxFloor.description: Maximum number of shares within an order to be shown on the exchange floor at any given time.

settlementDate.description: Settlement date of trade settlement in YYYYMMDD format

locateRequired.description: Indicates whether the broker is to locate the stock in conjunction with a short sell order.

account.description: Account for the basket, parent basket or position.

detail.description: Explanation specific to the occurrence of the error

pointer.description: Pointer to the associated entity in the request body

parameter.description: Indicates which path or URI query parameter caused the error

cfiCode.description: Classification of Financial Instruments. Indicates the type of security using ISO 0962 standard.

securityExchange.description: Market used to help identify a security.

maturityMonthYear.description: Month and Year of the maturity.

maturityDay.description: Day of month used in conjunction with maturityMonthYear to specify the maturity date

putOrCall.description: Indicates whether an Option is for a put or call.

basketId.description: Unique identifier assigned to basket order. Can be fetched from the WebSocket Order Update API.

ParentId.description: Unique identifier to identify the parent order.
